original_text: No eye pitied you, to do any of these things to you out of compassion for you, but you were cast out on the open field, for you were abhorred, on the day that you were born.
korean_text: 아무도 너를 돌보아 이 중에 한 가지라도 네게 행하여 너를 불쌍히 여긴 자가 없었으므로 네가 나던 날에 네 몸이 천하게 여겨져 네가 들에 버려졌느니라

sentences.korean_translation: 너를 불쌍히 여기는 눈은 아무도 없었다

sentences.original_text: to do any of these things to you out of compassion for you
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 불쌍히 여겨 너에게 이런 일들을 해 주려는 마음도 없었고

sentences.original_text: but you were cast out on the open field
on the day that you were born
